mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.SRT_NO) AS RNO , A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ , A.QUIZ_DTL_INFO_SEQ , B.QUIZ_USER_ANS_SEQ , B.QUIZ_USER_ANS_DTL_SEQ , A.SRT_NO , A.CONTENT , A.CMNTR , B.ERASE_YN FROM QUIZ_DTL_INFO A LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM QUIZ_USER_ANS_DTL WHERE QUIZ_USER_ANS_SEQ = #{quizUserAnsSeq}) B ON A.QUIZ_DTL_INFO_SEQ = B.QUIZ_DTL_INFO_SEQ WHERE A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ = #{quizMstrInfoSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE QUIZ_DTL_INFO SET DEL_YN = 'Y' , MDFY_TS = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE QUIZ_DTL_INFO_SEQ = #{quizDtlInfoSeq}
